mdRecord.dcterms:title: Civil War Veterans at 1913 Gettysburg Reunion
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Civil War veterans at 1913 Gettysburg Reunion. People in the photograph from left to right include: Caleb Sowers, Drum Major, Co. A 24th Inf.; Judge W.D. Vaughan (enlisted out of county); Rev. J.D. Utt (son of veteran W.L. Utt, 24th VA Inf.); Capt. William T. Sowers, Co. G 21st VA Cavalry; Capt. Peter F. Shelton, Co. A 24th Inf.; Sgt. J.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Gettysburg Reunion (1913)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
